author: Prime Video
description:
The Chosen: Last Supper is now streaming on Prime Video, globally on July 13. 

The table is set. The people of Israel welcome Jesus as king while His disciples anticipate his crowning. But—instead of confronting Rome—he turns the tables on the Jewish religious festival. Their power threatened, the country’s religious and political leaders will go to any length to ensure this Passover meal is Jesus’ last.

author: Prime Video
description:
Justice on Trial coming to Prime Video on July 21, 2025

Judge Judy Sheindlin puts the American justice system on trial in a true crime high-stakes courtroom drama, as she and her expert legal team recreate the trials from notorious cases where following the letter of the law did not necessarily feel “just.”
